com.paco.java.subway

Class NodeLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paco.java.subway.NodeLink
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntersecLink

    public class NodeLink
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a link between 2 Node. The class also contains the distance between the 2 Nodes
    Author:
    Pascal

      • NodeLink

        public NodeLink(Node oFirst,
        Node oSecond,
        int iNodeDistance)
        This constructor is used to create an association between 2 Node
        Parameters:
        oFirst - A non null Node (or sub-type)
        oSecond - A non null Node (or sub-type)
        iNodeDistance - The distance between the 2 Node

    • Method Detail

      • ExtractSubwayMap

        public static java.lang.String ExtractSubwayMap()
        This method will go around the entire map recorded Link by Link and will export all the link info in String format.
        Returns:
        A String containing a exported map of the SubwayMap

      • ContainsNode

        public boolean ContainsNode(java.lang.String sNodeName)
        Comparaison function that returns true if oNode is contained withint this NodeLink
        Parameters:
        oNode - : A non null node name to compare
        Returns:
        : True if this node name exists in this Link

      • ReplaceNode

        public void ReplaceNode(Node oNewNode)
        This method will replace the node of a Link. Name comparaison is used to replace the correct Node
        Parameters:
        oNewNode - A non null Node that will replace one of the 2 node of this link.
